tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_surveys (
    survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    satisfaction_score INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    question_id INT,
    response_value VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (survey_id) REFERENCES customer_survey(survey_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES survey_questions(question_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(255), customer_email VARCHAR(255), customer_phone VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE Survey (survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, survey_date DATE, survey_rating INT);
CREATE TABLE Survey_Question (question_id INT PRIMARY KEY, question_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Survey_Response (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, survey_id INT, question_id INT, response_text TEXT);
